name: Pirical
slogan: We’re on a mission to drive better decisions from people data
description:
Pirical, formerly Aspirant Analytics, was launched in 2015. Our past experiences range from corporate careers in McKinsey, Bloomberg, and Goldman Sachs to recent graduates of leading UK universities and European business schools.

Our customers are top international legal and professional services firms, excited by the power of data for managing their business.

We work with business leaders who are hungry for better ways of deciding where to focus attention, how to stand apart from the competition, and how to maximise their impact.

We obsess over the decisions our customers need to make next and develop products to guide their thinking.

We have grown organically into a company of nearly 30. Our customers love what we do; we provide them with evidence and tools to reduce bias, to work more efficiently and to pursue new growth opportunities.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Jason Ku
team.bioHtml: Founder, strong tech and business expertise (McKinsey, Bloomberg). INSEAD MBA, honour degrees in Computer Science, Economics and Mathematics

team.name: Hok-Him Poon
team.bioHtml: Founder @aspirantanalytics • Worked at @Goldman Sachs, @Bloomberg LP

team.name: Vera Levitskaya
team.bioHtml: Founder & CMO @Jku&Associates • Oversaw business development in Asia for €8b company, strong FMCG background @Loreal, @p&G • Studied at @INSEAD, @Escp Europe

team.name: Henri Egle Sorotos
team.bioHtml: Data practitioner with data engineering, machine learning and research skills, plus a hacker-like mentality.

team.name: Areti Vadasi
team.bioHtml: People Analytics & Organisational Psychology enthusiast, with a background on Education.

perks.title: Structured learning programmes for junior new joiners
Your own coffee budget to use with colleagues
Support and mentorship from the team
Complete ownership of products and projects

jobs.title: Customer Account Manager (Speculative Applicative)
jobs.description:
Please note: we are not actively hiring for this position but are likely to have opportunies in the near future. If you think you'd be a good fit, we'd be delighted to hear from you.

Our customers rely on communicative, proactive account managers to make sure insights projects are delivered successfully.

We are recruiting the next generation of analytics leaders who understand the value of blending traditional analytical thinking with the latest technical capabilities.

We are looking for people who can build strong relationships with our key customers and use insights gained to get the most out of our analysts.

Our analyst team has an informal, hard-working, and supportive team culture. 

Collectively we are small but diverse; we speak 13 languages between us.

We pride ourselves on ‘growing our own’ so you will be well-looked after while you learn the ropes.

You will work in a collaborative environment and own your work to help us build a successful business.

You
> You are an enthusiastic problem solver who loves a good challenge.
> You get a kick out of finding interesting insights, and even more so when you deliver good service to customers.
> You have an eye for design and can put together a Powerpoint that influences action
> You love numbers and data and have a proven background in Excel.
> You are a self-starter and want to work with other smart, hard-working people, to build something great that you'll be proud of.
> Working knowledge in Python, SQL and SPARQL is a plus.

You will be
> Client-facing and depended upon to support sales efforts and commercial negotiations
> Leading analysts and data engineers through the analytics process from beginning to end: defining problem statements, designing and building data cubes, processing data, interrogating data, writing insightful stories, and delivering to clients
> Using a large spectrum of analytics tools from Excel and Python to our proprietary data analytics platform
> Coaching junior members of the team
> Working closely with our engineers and developers to validate and suggest improvements to our proprietary software

With support and mentorship, you will master
> Project management
> Team leadership
> Client relationships and stakeholder management
> Fast-paced and software-enabled collaborative working
> Feedback and coaching techniques
> Data exploration and manipulation
> Statistical analysis
> Data visualisation and storytelling

jobs.title: Data Engineer (Speculative Application)
jobs.description:
Please note: we are not actively hiring for this position but are likely to have opportunies in the near future. If you think you'd be a good fit, we'd be delighted to hear from you.

Aspirant Analytics is looking for a bright and driven Data Engineer. You will work in a collaborative and agile environment, own your work, and build cutting edge data infrastructure. You will be part of our core team and work with us to build a successful business.

About us
We provide the most impactful People Analytics, delivered in the simplest way. Since winning the Innovate UK grant in 2015, we have been busy building technology that gives our clients game-changing insights about their people. Companies who have worked with us, love it! We’re so proud of what we’ve built so far, but we’re only just getting started.

We have an informal, hard-working, and supportive team culture. Our past experiences range from corporate careers in Bloomberg, Goldman Sachs, and McKinsey, to recent graduates of leading UK universities and European business schools.

Our Technology
Our infrastructure runs on AWS and we use many of its services (EC2, S3, SQS, Lambda, Elastic search to name a few). AngularJS is our choice of front-end web framework. Back-end services are built with NodeJS and Python, using Docker for deployment. Our knowledge graph is built using the RDF standard, queried with SPARQL. We employ a number of machine learning and automation techniques using Python. As we are a small team, over time you will gain experience working with all of the above technologies and tools.

About you
You are an enthusiastic problem solver who loves a good challenge. You have a good foundation in working with data and would embrace any opportunity to learn new technologies and techniques. You get a kick out of making things work, and even more so when you deliver good service to others. You are a self-starter and want to work with other smart, hard-working people, to build something great that you'll be proud of.

What’s in it for you
- You will learn a ton! Data Engineering will be your main focus, but you’ll get plenty of exposure to all elements of a startup environment
- You’ll be pioneering a new industry, one that has huge potential to drastically change the employer-employee relationship
- Very strong support and mentorship from the team - we invest in our people and we take it seriously

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer (Speculative Application)
jobs.description:
Please note: we are not actively hiring for this position but are likely to have opportunies in the near future. If you think you'd be a good fit, we'd be delighted to hear from you.

Aspirant Analytics is looking for a bright and driven Full-Stack Developer to help build our core analytics engine and web interfaces. You will work with cutting edge technology in a collaborative and agile environment. You'll be part of our core team and work with us to build a successful business. 

About us
We provide the most impactful People Analytics, delivered in the simplest way. Since winning the Innovate UK grant in 2015, we have been busy building technology that gives our clients game-changing insights about their people. Companies who have worked with us love it! We’re so proud of what we’ve built so far, but we’re only just getting started.

We have an informal, hard-working, and supportive team culture. Our past experiences range from corporate careers in Bloomberg, Goldman Sachs, and McKinsey, to recent graduates of leading UK universities and European business schools.

Our Technology
Our infrastructure runs on AWS and we use many of its services (EC2, S3, SQS, Lambda, Elastic search to name a few). AngularJS is our choice of front-end web framework. Back-end services are built with NodeJS and Python, using Docker for deployment. Our knowledge graph is built using the RDF standard, queried with SPARQL. We employ a number of machine learning and automation techniques using Python. As we are a small team, over time you will have worked with all of the above technologies and tools.

About you
You are an enthusiastic problem solver who loves a good challenge. You have a good foundation in web development and would embrace any opportunity to learn new technologies across the stack. You get a kick out of making things work, and even more so when you deliver good service to others. You are a self-starter and want to work with other smart, hard-working people, to build something great that you'll be proud of.

What you can expect to get here
- Working on cutting-edge technology, continuously learning and testing new things
- Support and mentorship from the team, on technical and other aspects - we invest in our people and we take it seriously
- Taking complete ownership of the products and projects
- Exposure to clients and their senior management

jobs.title: Sales Executive (Speculative Application)
jobs.description:
Please note: we are not actively hiring for this position but are likely to have opportunies in the near future. If you think you'd be a good fit, we'd be delighted to hear from you.

Our sales people are hugely influential across the business. They hold the relationships to our customers and are at the forefront of our brand. 

We're looking for ambitious and commercially-minded strategists who think creatively and are excited to be part of our mission. 

You’ll be instrumental in supporting our ambitions to scale and focused on delivering value and impact for our customers.

We pride ourselves on ‘growing our own’ so you will be supported while you learn the ropes within our collaborative culture. 

You
> You are an enthusiastic problem solver who loves a good challenge. 
> You are excited to help build a successful tech business. 
> You love people, interacting with intelligent customers and helping them to understand their problems and the impact our technology can have. 
> You are a self-starter and want to work with other smart, hard-working
people, to build something great that you'll be proud of. 
> You are excited by ambitious targets and strive to over-perform month after month.

You will be
> Developing strong, long-term, trust-based relationships with core clients.
> Identifying new opportunities: markets, partnerships, geographies etc.
> Supporting marketing activities for all of Aspirant’s products.
> Representing Aspirant at key industry events.
> Supporting Aspirant’s client events.
> Shaping the future development of our products.

We will support and mentor you to learn
> Project management and team leadership.
> Client relationships and stakeholder management.
> Fast-paced and software-enabled collaborative working.
> Feedback and coaching techniques.
> Sales and marketing strategies.

jobs.title: Senior Data Engineer (Speculative Application)
jobs.description:
Please note: we are not actively hiring for this position but are likely to have opportunies in the near future. If you think you'd be a good fit, we'd be delighted to hear from you.

**Want to work with cutting edge graph databases, create production standard machine learning solutions, and develop data pipelines on a forward thinking SaaS database solution?** 

We are looking for a Senior Data Engineer to push the boundaries of product development with our thriving and profitable Revael Lawyers software, as we prepare to enter new sectors and markets. 

Revael Lawyers is a global database of legal talent, populated by mature, scalable, and automated data pipelines. Our Machine Learning algorithms refine unstructured public data from the web into domain specific insights, allowing our clients to search with precision.

All of it is built on semantic web graph database technology.

About you:

* You have excellent Python programming skills and have solid data engineering experience in Python.
* You have a good understanding of Agile methodology and software engineering best practices.
* You design simple solutions substantiated with clear startup business sense.
* You communicate your ideas effectively and clearly.
* You are a self-starter and a leader, and would provide guidance and support to junior team members at any given opportunity.
* Data mining experience is a plus.

What you will do:

* Design and build on our data mining and automation processes essential to the maintenance of the Knowledge Hub.
* Extend and improve our graph data model to represent more market knowledge.
* Take ownership of the inner working of the Knowledge Hub - ensuring our data engineering techniques produce good quality knowledge for the Revael Lawyers product.
* Manage your own projects and set clear expectations with stakeholders.
* Be a mentor to junior engineers.

Technologies we use include:

* Graph databases
* Semantic web standards
* Ontologies and knowledge representation
* Machine learning
* Statistics and data visualisation
* Scrapy

Why Aspirant?

* Be empowered as an expert in your field
* Be part of a rapidly growing, well-run start-up. Aspirant Analytics is still wholly owned by its founders.
* Work with other ambitious, talented people in a diverse and close-knit team.
* Pioneer a new industry, one that has huge potential to drastically change the employer-employee relationship.
* Receive strong support from the team - we invest in our people and we take it seriously.

jobs.title: Senior Insight Analyst (Speculative Application)
jobs.description:
Please note: we are not actively hiring for this position but are likely to have opportunies in the near future. If you think you'd be a good fit, we'd be delighted to hear from you.

Analysts are the frontline of our work.

We are looking for people keen to combine traditional analytical skills with the latest technical capabilities.

Our analyst team has an informal, hard-working, and supportive team culture. 

Collectively we are small but diverse; we speak 13 languages between us.

We pride ourselves on ‘growing our own’ so you will be well-looked after while you learn the ropes.

> Working knowledge in Python, SQL and SPARQL is a plus.

You will be
> Running the analytics process from beginning to end: defining problem statements, designing and building data cubes, processing data, interrogating data, writing insightful stories, and delivering to clients
> Using a large spectrum of analytics tools from Excel and Python to our proprietary data analytics platform
> Coaching junior members of the team
> Client-facing and depended upon to support sales efforts and commercial negotiations
> Working closely with our engineers and developers to validate and suggest improvements to our proprietary software

With support and mentorship, you will master
> Project management
> Team leadership
> Client relationships and stakeholder management
> Fast-paced and software-enabled collaborative working
> Feedback and coaching techniques

> Statistical analysis
> Data visualisation and storytelling

You can expect to work with cutting-edge technology including
> Graph databases

> Ontologies and knowledge representation
> Machine learning
> Statistics and data visualisation
> Secure enterprise web applications

jobs.title: Senior Knowledge Engineer (Speculative Application)
jobs.description:
Please note: we are not actively hiring for this position but are likely to have opportunies in the near future. If you think you'd be a good fit, we'd be delighted to hear from you.

**Want to work with cutting edge graph databases, create production standard machine learning solutions, and develop data pipelines on a forward thinking SaaS database solution?** 

We are looking for a Senior Knowledge Engineer to push the boundaries of product development with our thriving and profitable Revael Lawyers software, as we prepare to enter new sectors and markets. 

Revael Lawyers is a global database of legal talent, populated by mature, scalable, and automated data pipelines. Our Machine Learning algorithms refine unstructured public data from the web into domain specific insights, allowing our clients to search with precision.

All of it is built on semantic web graph database technology.

About you:
